ch.makery.address.model.repository

Interface PersonRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersonRepositoryImpl

    public interface PersonRepository
    Interface that defines how to implement a Person repository.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deletePerson(int id)
      Opens a database connection and deletes a specific person.
      void editPerson(PersonVO person)
      Opens a database connection and updates the received person.
      java.util.List<PersonVO> loadPersonList()
      Opens a database connection and queries all the persons in the database.
      void savePerson(PersonVO newPerson)
      Opens a database connection and inserts a new person.

    • Method Detail

      • savePerson

        void savePerson(PersonVO newPerson)
         throws PersonException
        Opens a database connection and inserts a new person.
        Parameters:
        newPerson - - the object with the new data to insert
        Throws:
        PersonException - Exception thrown if a controlled error happens

      • deletePerson

        void deletePerson(int id)
           throws PersonException
        Opens a database connection and deletes a specific person.
        Parameters:
        id - - the ID of the person to delete
        Throws:
        PersonException - Exception thrown if a controlled error happens

      • editPerson

        void editPerson(PersonVO person)
         throws PersonException
        Opens a database connection and updates the received person.
        Parameters:
        person - - the data to send to the database
        Throws:
        PersonException - Exception thrown if a controlled error happens

      • loadPersonList

        java.util.List<PersonVO> loadPersonList()
                                 throws PersonException
        Opens a database connection and queries all the persons in the database.
        Returns:
        ArrayList - The list of persons in the database
        Throws:
        PersonException - Exception thrown if a controlled error happens
